SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.TUI

Class GameView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.ClientView
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.TUI.GameView
public class GameView extends ClientView
The GameView class is responsible for managing the view of the game playing phase. It handles the game's state, player's hand, market, chat, and other game-related views. It also handles the communication with the server and processes the game events.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameView

      public GameView(String nick, TokenColor tokenColor)
      Constructs a new GameView with the specified nickname and token color.
      Parameters:
      nick - the player's nickname
      tokenColor - the player's token color

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      This method starts the game thread and handles the client input. It initializes the game interface printer, hand view controller, playable view controller, market view controller, and chat view controller. It also starts a new thread to handle the user's input and game events.

    • killGame

      public void killGame()
      This method is used to stop the game. It sets the isRunning flag to false, which will stop the game loop.

    • chooseObjective

      public void chooseObjective(Boolean card)
      This method is used to choose an objective card in the game. It calls the chooseOBJ method of the client handler, passing the card status.
      Parameters:
      card - The Objective Card chosen by the player (true if the card is the first one, false if it's the second one).

    • setTurn

      public void setTurn(Boolean t)
      This method is used to set the turn status of the player. If the player's turn is set to true, the game interface printer's isPlaying flag is also set to true.
      Parameters:
      t - Boolean value representing whether it's the player's turn or not.

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard(int handIndex, int[] cardLocation)
      This method is used to play a card in the game. It calls the playCard method of the client handler, passing the hand index and the card location. It then waits for the server's response to check if the card was played successfully.
      Parameters:
      handIndex - The index of the card in the player's hand.
      cardLocation - The location to play the card at.
      Returns:
      true if the card was played successfully, false otherwise.

    • playInitialCard

      public void playInitialCard()
      This method is used to play the initial card in the game. It calls the playCard method of the client handler, passing the fixed parameters for the initial card.

    • drawCard

      public boolean drawCard(int card)
      This method is used to draw a card from the deck. If the card index is valid, it calls the drawCard method of the client handler, passing the card index.*
      Parameters:
      card - The index of the card to be drawn.

    • updateHand

      public void updateHand(List<String> hand)
      This method is used to update the hand view with the given list of cards. If the hand view controller is not initialized yet, it adds the hand to the hand queue. If the hand view controller is initialized, it calls the updateHandView method of the hand view controller, passing the hand.
      Overrides:
      updateHand in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      hand - The list of cards to update the hand view with.

    • updateMarket

      public void updateMarket(List<String> cards)
      This method is used to update the market view with the given list of cards. If the market view controller is not initialized yet or the player is still choosing cards, it adds the market cards to the market queue. If the market view controller is initialized and the player is not choosing cards, it calls the updateMarketView method of the market view controller, passing the market cards.
      Overrides:
      updateMarket in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      cards - The list of cards to update the market view with.

    • updateMessage

      public void updateMessage(MessageUpdate messageUpdate)
      This method is used to update the game view based on the server message. It processes the server message and updates the game view accordingly.
      Overrides:
      updateMessage in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      messageUpdate - The server message to process.

    • updateChoosingCard

      public void updateChoosingCard(String card, String obj1, String obj2)
      This method is used to update the choosing view with the given cards. If the playable view controller is not initialized yet, it adds the cards to the choosing queue. If the playable view controller is initialized, it calls the updateChoosableCard method of the playable view controller, passing the cards.
      Overrides:
      updateChoosingCard in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      card - The initial card to be displayed on the console.
      obj1 - The first objective card to be displayed on the console.
      obj2 - The second objective card to be displayed on the console.

    • updateTurns

      public void updateTurns(String nickname)
      This method is used to update the turn status of the players. If the player is waiting for other players, it sets the waitingOtherPlayers flag to false. If the player is not choosing cards, it calls the setTurn method of the game interface printer, passing the turn status.
      Overrides:
      updateTurns in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to check if it's his turn.

    • updateEnd

      public void updateEnd(List<String> winners)
      This method is used to update the game view when the game ends. It prints the list of winners and clears the console.
      Overrides:
      updateEnd in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      winners - The list of winners to be printed.

    • updateResource

      public void updateResource(List<Integer> resource)
      This method is used to update the resource view with the given list of resources. If the player is not choosing cards, it calls the updateResources method of the game interface printer, passing the resources.
      Overrides:
      updateResource in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      resource - The list of resources to update the resource view with.

    • updatePlayers

      public void updatePlayers(Stack<String> players, Stack<Long> pings, Stack<Integer> points)
      This method is used to update the players' view with the given list of players, pings, and points. If the player is not choosing cards, it calls the updatePlayers method of the game interface printer, passing the players, pings, and points.
      Overrides:
      updatePlayers in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      players - The list of players to update the players view with.
      pings - The list of pings to update the players view with.
      points - The list of points to update the players view with.

    • updateChat

      public void updateChat(Stack<String> messages)
      This method is used to update the chat view with the given list of messages. If the player is not choosing cards, it calls the updateChat method of the chat view controller, passing the messages.
      Overrides:
      updateChat in class ClientView
      Parameters:
      messages - The list of messages to update the chat view with.

    • processHandQueue

      public void processHandQueue()
      This method is responsible for processing the hand queue in the game. The hand queue is a queue of game events related to the player's hand. If the hand queue is not empty, it enters a while loop that continues until the hand queue is empty. Inside the loop, it calls the `updateHandView()` method of the handViewController` object, passing the head of the `handQueue` as an argument.

    • processMarketQueue

      public void processMarketQueue()
      This method is responsible for processing the market queue in the game. The market queue is a queue of game events related to the market. If the market queue is not empty, it enters a while loop that continues until the market queue is empty. Inside the loop, it calls the method of the marketViewController` object, passing the head of the queue.

    • processChoosingQueue

      public void processChoosingQueue()
      This method is responsible for processing the choosing queue in the game. The choosing queue is a queue of game events related to the choosing of cards. If the choosing queue is not empty, it enters a while loop that continues until the choosing queue is empty. Inside the loop, it retrieves and removes the head of the `chosingQueue` and stores it in the `cards` array. It then calls the `updateChoosableCard()` method of the `playableViewController` object, passing the elements of the `cards` array as arguments.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String message)
      Sends a message to the server via the client handler. If the message is empty, the method will return without sending anything.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be sent to the server.

    • clearConsole

      public static void clearConsole()
      Clears the console by printing a special character sequence.

    • showServerMsg

      public void showServerMsg(MessageUpdate messageUpdate)
      This method is used to show a server message on the console. It processes the server message and prints it on the console.
      Parameters:
      messageUpdate - The server message to process.

    • getNick

      public String getNick()
      Returns:
      The player's nickname as a string.

    • handleUserCommand

      private void handleUserCommand(CommandHandler commandHandler)
      This method is used to handle a user command. It reads the user's input from the console and processes it using the command handler.
      Parameters:
      commandHandler - The command handler to process the user's input.

    • isChatOpen

      public void isChatOpen(Boolean isChatOpen)
      This method is used to set the chat open status. If the chat is open, it sets the chatOpen flag of the game interface printer to true.
      Parameters:
      isChatOpen - The chat open status.

    • isPrivateChatOpen

      public void isPrivateChatOpen(Boolean isPrivateChatOpen)
      This method is used to set the private chat open status. If the private chat is open, it sets the privateChatOpen flag of the game interface printer to true.
      Parameters:
      isPrivateChatOpen - The private chat open status.

    • setIsPlaying

      public void setIsPlaying(boolean isPlaying)
      Parameters:
      isPlaying - The boolean to set if the player is playing.

    • getIsChoosing

      public boolean getIsChoosing()

      Returns:
      boolean value representing whether the player is in the choosing phase or not.

      public void setIsChoosing(boolean isChoosing)
      This method is used to set the choosing status of the player.
      Parameters:

      public void setIsInMenu(boolean isInMenu)

      This method is used to get the current menu status of the player.
